channel.title: [Need Help ASAP] Webclient using Rics Tutorial..!
channel.description:
Heyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy Eclipsedz here again once again with the same problem BUT this time I think I have almost managed to turn one of my clients into a webclient using Ric's tutorial which can be found here..
Rics webclient TUT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=336494.0
I GOTTEN NEAR THE VERY END OF THE TUT BUT PROBLEM IS! I NEED A FILE HOSTER TO HOST MY CLIENTS Cache.zip So basically I need help finding a file hoster that can help me host my clients cache so that when the webclient loads it downloads the cache..Ive edited my client files so that its downloadable only problem now is finding a file hoster to host my Clients Cache.zip
ANY HELP!!! THANK YOU ! [IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/9208/moparscapershelp.png[/img]
